question: Using the scale bar, estimate the diameter of the vacuole in <image 1>.
description: The image shows a microscopic view of cellular structures, specifically highlighting a vacuole within a cell. The vacuole appears as a dark, circular region within the cell. There is a scale bar in the image labeled "5 µm," indicating the length of the bar is 5 micrometers (µm). The vacuole is approximately the same size as this scale bar, suggesting its diameter is close to 5 µm.
